Ph2_HwDescription::BeBoard

Ph2_HwDescription::BeBoard Class Reference

Read/Write BeBoard's registers on a file, handles a register map and handles a vector of Module which are connected to the BeBoard. More...

Detailed Description

Read/Write BeBoard's registers on a file, handles a register map and handles a vector of Module which are connected to the BeBoard.
